long_description: This base-prep cleaner effortlessly cuts through and clears away old base applications, leaving you a fresh, clean surface to tune. Waxes have a high degree of tough, water-resistant materials, making them difficult to remove without a base cleaner. User-friendly Swix(R) cleaner uses no toxic chemicals. Contains 946 ml (32 fl. oz.); the size information in the ''Place Your Order Here'' box incorrectly states 1000 ml.
short_description: This base-prep cleaner effortlessly cuts through and clears away old base applications, leaving you a fresh, clean surface to tune.
